scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build::tsc
scripts.watch::tsc: npx cross-env ROARR_LOG=true NODE_ENV=development npx tsc --watch
scripts.watch::node: npx cross-env ROARR_LOG=true NODE_ENV=development npx nodemon ./dist/index.js
scripts.start::dev: npm run watch::tsc --silent | npm run watch::node | npm run watch::roarr::dev
scripts.start::prod: npm run build && npm run start::node | npm run watch::roarr::prod
